Package org.thingsboard.server.service.rpc

Interface TbCoreDeviceRpcService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTbCoreDeviceRpcService
    public interface TbCoreDeviceRpcService
    Handles REST API calls that contain RPC requests to Device.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void forwardRpcRequestToDeviceActor​(ToDeviceRpcRequestActorMsg request)
      Forwards the RPC request from Rule Engine to Device Actor

      Handles REST API calls that contain RPC requests to Device and pushes them to Rule Engine.

                              java.util.function.Consumer<FromDeviceRpcResponse> responseConsumer,
                              SecurityUser currentUser)
        Handles REST API calls that contain RPC requests to Device and pushes them to Rule Engine. Schedules the timeout for the RPC call based on the ToDeviceRpcRequest

        responseConsumer - the consumer of the RPC response
